articles.content: The Reserve Bank of India has released the price for early/premature redemption of the Sovereign Gold Bond Scheme (SGB 2016-II and 2016-17-Series II) due on March 29, 2023.What is SGB?SGBs are govern… [+3165 chars]

articles.author: Kshitij Anand
articles.title: HNIs, algo prop traders can have a huge impact from STT hike: Mehul Kothari - The Economic Times
articles.description: At this point in time, Nifty is still holding on to the support of the lower end of a falling channel. This channel holds importance because the index is trading inside this falling channel since it made an all-time high.
articles.content: "FM's move can have a big impact on options traders. Retailers who trade in a negligible number of lots wont be affected much but HNIs and prop traders can have a huge impact," says Mehul Kothari AVP… [+3889 chars]
